```{r}

library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("../Dataset/Data_equilibrated.xlsx", col_names = TRUE)
```

Libraries:
```{r,'error=FALSE', 'warning=FALSE'}
library(readxl)
library(survival)
library(survminer)
library(dplyr) 
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(tidyr)
```

Summary:
```{r}
summary(data)

```
Remove Technology Development satellite and Oceania ( giÃ  rimossi nel dataset equilibrated )

Rendi colonne factor:
```{r}
data$Country <- factor(data$Country, ordered = F)
print('Country')
table(data$Country)

data$Continent <- factor(data$Continent, ordered = F)
print('Continent')
table(data$Continent)

data$Users <- factor(data$Users, ordered = F)
print('Users')
table(data$Users)

data$Purpose <- factor(data$Purpose, ordered = F)
print('Purpose')
table(data$Purpose)

data$Orbit <- factor(data$Orbit, ordered = F)
print('Class of Orbit')
table(data$Orbit)

data$Status <- factor(data$Status, ordered = F)
print('Status')
table(data$Status)
```
Mischia righe

```{r}
data <- data[sample(nrow(data)), ]

```


Cox Model
```{r}
time <- data$'Effective Lifetime'
Status <- data$Status
covariates <- c("Users","Purpose","Orbit","Longitude of GEO","Perigee","Apogee","Eccentricity","Inclination","Period","Mass", "Continent")

cox1 <- coxph(Surv(time, Status == 'retired') ~ . , data = data[,covariates])

summary(cox1)
```
````{r}
id <- which(data$Orbit == 'MEO')
data$Orbit[id] = 'Elliptical'
data$Orbit <-factor(data$Orbit)
```

```{r}
time <- data$'Effective Lifetime'
Status <- data$Status
covariates <- c("Purpose","Orbit","Longitude of GEO","Perigee","Apogee","Eccentricity","Period", "Continent")


cox3a <- coxph(Surv(time, Status == 'retired') ~ . , data = data[,covariates])

summary(cox3a)

```

```{r}
id <- which(data$Purpose == 'Navigation')
data$Purpose[id] = 'Communications'
data$Purpose <-factor(data$Purpose)
```

```{r}
time <- data$'Effective Lifetime'
Status <- data$Status
covariates <- c("Purpose","Orbit","Longitude of GEO","Perigee","Apogee","Eccentricity","Period", "Continent")

cox3b <- coxph(Surv(time, Status == 'retired') ~ . , data = data[,covariates])

summary(cox3b)
```

Let's check model assumptions:
```{r}
test1 <- cox.zph(cox3b)
test1  ###  non va 
```

Plot of scaled schoenfeld residuals:
```{r}
ggcoxdiagnostics(cox3b, type = "scaledsch")
```
